御.definition: (bound form) imperial; royal; (literary) to drive (a carriage); (literary) to manage; to govern

御史.definition: imperial censor (formal title of a dynastic official)

御姐.definition: (ACG) mature, assertive, and usu. sexy woman

御宅族.definition: otaku, a Japanese term for people with obsessive interests such as anime, manga, and video games; see also 宅男[zhai2 nan2]; see also 宅女[zhai2 nu:3]

御手.definition: the emperor's hand; variant of 馭手|驭手[yu4 shou3]

御批.definition: imperial rescript; emperor's written instructions in response to a report

御用.definition: for use by the emperor; imperial; (derog.) in the pay of the ruler

御賜.definition: to be bestowed by the emperor

御駕親征.definition: the emperor leads his troops into battle (idiom); to take part personally in an expedition
